thread.title: Gordon
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Gordon

author: Gordon
title: Gordon
text: I had a flat tire on a Saturday, but the matching tire that I needed was not in stock. Tom went out of his way to call several places and found one in stock at Sullivan Tire. He explained to me that it would be 2 or 3 hours before they would be able to get my tire from Middleboro and asked if I wanted to wait. A few hours later my tire arrived and was installed right away. I am so grateful that I did not need to wait until Monday.
